main(String[]) - Static method in class Main
The application's main method, just an execution entry point.
Main - Class in Unnamed Package
The application's main class, just to hold the main method.
Main() - Constructor for class Main
 
MainMenuOptions - Enum Class in presentation.views
Options that can be used in the menu, including: MainMenuOptions.CHARACTER_CREATION MainMenuOptions.LIST_CHARACTERS MainMenuOptions.CREATE_ADVENTURE MainMenuOptions.START_ADVENTURE

mind - Variable in class business.entities.Character
 
Monster - Class in business.entities
Class representing a monster in the application's business model.
Monster(String, String, int, int, int, String, String) - Constructor for class business.entities.Monster
Constructor with name, challenge, experience, health points, initiative, damageDice and damageType parameters, for new monsters.
MonsterAPIDAO - Class in persistence.json.monster
Class that implements the methods described in the MonsterDAO interface, and will be used as a way to physically separate the persistence layer from the rest of the application.
MonsterAPIDAO() - Constructor for class persistence.json.monster.MonsterAPIDAO
Constructor to be able to read monsters information from the Cloud.
MonsterDAO - Interface in persistence.json.monster
Interface that abstracts the persistence of monsters from uppers.
MonsterFileNotFoundException - Exception Class in persistence.exceptions
Custom exception to raise when something goes wrong when trying to access the monster's json file.
MonsterFileNotFoundException(String) - Constructor for exception class persistence.exceptions.MonsterFileNotFoundException
Constructor with parameters for a custom persistence exception caused by another one.
MonsterJsonDAO - Class in persistence.json.monster
Class that implements the methods described in the MonsterDAO interface, and will be used as a way to physically separate the persistence layer from the rest of the application.
MonsterJsonDAO(String) - Constructor for class persistence.json.monster.MonsterJsonDAO
Parametrized constructor to be able to read monsters information.
MonsterManager - Class in business
Class that focuses on logic related to monsters and connects the business layer to lower ones, specifically the persistence layer.
MonsterManager(DataMenuOptions) - Constructor for class business.MonsterManager
Default constructor, which uses either the JSON Data Access Object for monsters with a fixed file or the API Data Access Object for monsters.
